p: Numerous studies conducted in recent years have shown that regular consumption of dairy products can have a protective effect against the development of obesity and cardiovascular disease. The most consumed dairy products are yoghurt and cheese. Yoghurt is defined as a food in the form of a thick and slightly sour liquid that is obtained by adding bacteria in milk [ 5]. Yoghurt consumption has increased worldwide due to its nutritional value, therapeutic effects, and functional properties. To improve the nutritional and sensory properties of yoghurt, processors have begun to add different fruits or additives to their compositions [ 3]. Due to these characteristics, we decided to choose yoghurt as the dairy product that we will enrich with antioxidant compounds.
